description: From a series of nine etchings, Das Gesicht (The Face), published by Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924; man in the foreground on the right side looking directly at the viewer; behind his left shoulder is a woman in profile with eyes downcast; print in green ink with a large band of dense green ink running horizontally across the sheet just above the center of the print; this band of ink runs across the forehead of the man
inscription: ULC in plate: W.G. 22 | LL margin of sheet, in pencil: Walter Gramatté, Aus der Mappe \"Das Gesicht\" Bl. 6, \"Das Paar\" (E.160)
portfolio: From Plate 6 from Das Gesicht (The Face), Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924
title: The Couple (Self-Portrait with Wife), Plate 6 from Das Gesicht (The Face)
